testcaseName: Patient is 12 months of age and has been administered the Moderna Covid-19 vaccine as a first dose and Pfizer Covid-19 as second dose

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient that is 12 months of age has been administered the first dose Moderna's Covid-19 vaccine (CVX Code 228) and a second dose of the Covid19 vaccine as Pfizer's (CVX 219), that the doses are valid. Another dose should be forecast.
